title: Strike: Banking may be hit; transport and schools to function as usual
content:
A strike is underway.
*   Banking services may face disruption.
*   Transport and schools are expected to function as usual.

title: Less than half of those trained under PM-DAKSH scheme for SCs, BCs, DNTs got jobs
content:
Less than 50% of individuals who received training under the PM-DAKSH scheme have successfully secured jobs.
*   The PM-DAKSH scheme is specifically designed to provide training for Scheduled Castes (SCs), Backward Classes (BCs), and Denotified Tribes (DNTs).
*   This highlights a significant gap in the scheme's effectiveness in converting training into employment opportunities for its target beneficiaries.

title: Union Minister Shivraj Singh Chauhan attends Janpratinidhi Sammelan in Agartala
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Union Minister Shivraj Singh Chauhan was present.
*   He attended the "Janpratinidhi Sammelan."
*   The event took place in Agartala.

title: Villagers skip meeting convened by Odisha govt over Anganwadi boycott row
content:
Villagers in Odisha did not attend a meeting that was organized by the state government.
*   Their absence was a form of protest directly linked to an ongoing boycott of Anganwadi services.
*   This highlights an existing dispute or "row" concerning Anganwadi services in the region.

title: Antimicrobial resistance: Charles Darwin was right; India’s drug policy isn’t
content:
The central topic is the critical issue of antimicrobial resistance (AMR).
*   Charles Darwin's evolutionary theories are affirmed as correctly explaining the natural development of AMR.
*   India's current drug policy is criticized for its inadequacy or ineffectiveness in combating antimicrobial resistance.

title: Anna University inaugurates state-of-the-art AI lab
content:
Anna University has officially opened a new Artificial Intelligence (AI) laboratory.
*   The newly inaugurated facility is described as "state-of-the-art."
*   This marks a significant advancement for the university in enhancing its AI capabilities.

title: U.P. budget 2026: BJP’s farewell budget, lacks focus, says Opposition
content:
The Uttar Pradesh (U.P.) budget for 2026 has been announced.
*   The Opposition has labeled it the BJP's "farewell budget," implying the party's impending departure from power.
*   The Opposition further criticizes the budget for lacking focus.

title: Protest against Ken-Betwa river link project turns violent in M.P.; 3 cases lodged
content:
A protest against the Ken-Betwa river link project occurred in Madhya Pradesh.
*   The demonstration escalated and turned violent.
*   Authorities have lodged three legal cases in connection with the incident.

title: Haryana citizens send 11,000 suggestions to govt.’s AI-based portal for State budget
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Citizens in Haryana have submitted a large volume of feedback.
*   They sent 11,000 suggestions to the state government.
*   The suggestions were submitted through an AI-based portal for the State budget.

title: KMRL gets nod to seek ₹1016-cr. loan for Kochi metro phase-2
content:
KMRL (Kochi Metro Rail Limited) has received approval.
*   This approval allows them to seek a loan of ₹1016 crore.
*   The funds are intended for the development of Kochi Metro's Phase 2.
